PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-12592010-10-12,  HRSDC,  ,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE (EI) REGULATIONS, in order to introduce Pilot Project No. 15 for two years with an automatic trigger for participating regions tied to regional unemployment rates that fall to a level less than 8% for 12 consecutive months and to extend the Best 14 Weeks and Working While on Claim pilot projects by eight months in order to collect additional data and continue testing during a period of economic recovery.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0214 Publication Date: 2010-10-27
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE (EI) REGULATIONS, in order to introduce Pilot Project No. 15 for two years with an automatic trigger for participating regions tied to regional unemployment rates that fall to a level less than 8% for 12 consecutive months and to extend the Best 14 Weeks and Working While on Claim pilot projects by eight months in order to collect additional data and continue testing during a period of economic recovery.
